definition: lower boundary
(equivalent to 的 as possessive particle)
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
boundary/scope/extent/circles/group/kingdom (taxonomy)

sentences.english: Based on the study above, the bottom boundary of Badaowan Formation is redetermined.
sentences.chinese: 據此對八道灣組的底界進行了重新釐定。

definition: lower Cambrian series (geological strata from approx 530 million years ago)

Ordovician system (geology)/see 奧陶紀|奥陶纪
carboniferous system/coal measure (geology)
Indo-Chinese epoch (geology)/Indosinian orogeny
low velocity zone (seismology)/also called asthenosphere 軟流層|软流层[ruan3 liu2 ceng2]
stratum (geology)
mafic rock (containing magnesium and iron, so comparatively heavy, making oceanic plates)
Eocene system (geology)
holocene system (geological strata laid down during the last 12000 years)
to emerge
collisional orogeny/mountain building as a result of continents colliding
ophiolite (geology)
East Pacific Rise (a mid-oceanic ridge stretching from California to Antarctica)

definition: ophiolite (geology)
Ediacaran (c. 635-542 million years ago), late phase of pre-Cambrian geological era
